title: Done Sharing a Closet? Our One Bedroom has Two! Move in Today!
posting_body: ['Call Now -', 'show contact info', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 741 Sq.', 'Ft.', "Come home to Regatta Apartments and you'll have the wonderful peace of mind of a gated community, the extravagant feeling of resort-like landscaping and a magnificent poolside setting, and the ease and convenience of a perfect location in Northglenn, CO.", "It's serene and tranquil here, with a walking and biking trail that meanders right through our property.", "You'll find our apartment homes elegant and refined with individualized touches to match your personality.", 'And to keep life simple, we offer easy access to the west to go skiing, and major thoroughfares to get to Downtown or the airport quickly.', "And we're just minutes from the finest retail shops, restaurants and entertainment including Coors Field and Ball Arena.", 'Features:', 'Pet Friendly, Intrusion Alarm Systems, White-on-White Appliances, Private Patios/Balconies, Gourmet Kitchens, Stainless Steel Appliances, Garbage Disposal, New/Renovated Interior, Gas-Burning Fireplaces*, Extra Storage, Walk-in Closets, Custom Tile Entryways, Individually controlled central air conditioning and heating, Large Oval Tubs*, 9-Foot Ceilings with Crown Molding*, Ceiling Fans*, Built-in Microwave, Full-Size Washer/Dryer Connections, Dishwasher, Personal Storage Areas', '*In Select Units', 'Community Amenities:', "Magnificent Pool, 24-Hour State-of-the-Art Fitness Center, Sports Court, Mountain Views, Media Center & Theater, Open-air hot tub for year-round use, Beautiful Landscaping, 24-Hour Business Center, Gated Community, Barbecue Area with Fire Pit, Tanning Bed, Bike Repair, Online Rental Payment, Dog Wash, Resident Referral Programs, Package Acceptance At The Office, Complimentary Access to DVD Library, Pet Exercise Park, Children's Lounge in Fitness Center, Splash Park", 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed', 'Use the link below for more details:', '<URL>', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'P4BgUl3NRo2']
